desc: A memory foam mattress for a price you won't need to take lying down. With over 40 years' experience, we're experts in the art of good sleep. Try HÜGGE now.

layout.text: Your best night’s sleep, ever... +100 nights risk free

Why buy a HÜGGE? A Scandanavian ethos with British design. A genuine memory foam mattress that is super comfy and odourless - the HÜGGE mattress is CertiPUR certified and our unique hypoallergenic, multi layer, temperature regulating TENCEL® Body HÜGGE Technology provides amazing comfort built to last.
